dmca.title: UK Court Order Received by Google
dmca.body: UK Court Order received by Google requiring removal of webpages publishing any personally identifying information of a specific Child and its Parents or carers, including photographs, name and addresses, if that information is likely to lead to the Child being identified as one in the care of the local authority or an adopted child. The Order appears to require that any information published regarding the case have the names/ personal information of parties involved anonymized, and forces Google to remove webpages that do not comply with the Order.
